messages.title: Working hard for you
messages.content: In 2005 I made 5 promises to you about jobs, transport, community safety and schools. Each promise has been met.

messages.title: He's one of the good guys
messages.content: I am very glad we have an MP who actually lives in our city and cares about the community. I can see just how much time and effort he puts in to helping people. He's one of the good guys! - Helen Moylett, Constituent

keyPolicies.policyTitle: More affordable housing to rent and buy
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Over 200 new affordable homes built; new investment in council homes underway.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Better use of powers to tackle anti-social behaviour
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Neighbourhood police teams in place across Southampton spending 95% of their time on the beat.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: More young people to stay on in education or training
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Local young people not in employment, education or training down 24%.
The only local MP who supports offering pre-school and after-school activities from 8am-6pm.
Free pensioner bus travel delivered; local recycling rates up.

issues.economy: With Labour - help with your energy bills and new green jobs in the south. With the Tories you’ll get a lot of green talk, but no action.
issues.education: More young people to stay on in education or training. Local young people not in employment, education or training down 24%.
issues.socialWelfare: With Labour - it’s new jobs and apprenticeships, work or training for all young people. With the Tories, you’ll just be told to get on your bike!

housing.content: More affordable housing to rent and buy. Over 200 new affordable homes built; new investment in council homes underway.

leaflet.personalStatement: I'm Alan Whitehead, your Labour Candidate for Southampton Test. I've lived in Southampton all my adult life and I'm proud to have represented our city since 1997. If you choose me to re-elect me, I'll work for a fair deal for you, your family and our city.

politicalExperience.achievements: In 2005 I made 5 promises to you about jobs, transport, community safety and schools. Each promise has been met.

endorsements.endorsement: I am very glad we have an MP who actually lives in our city and cares about the community. I can see just how much time and effort he puts in to helping people. He's one of the good guys!

images.caption: Alan Whitehead at the football stadium.
Alan Whitehead with a group of people.
